about_the_game:
Land your drone upon a mysterious island and search for the artifact. Confined to your lack of resources, the drone has a very limited skillset. With no high quality video feed, you are forced to experience your surroundings through pictures. Find the artifact, retrieve it, avoid the guardian, and return home alive.

Features

  • A small open world littered with glimpses into the island's past to explore
  • A mix of First Person and Dronelike gameplay
  • A story told through the environment

Vault is broken up into an Introduction, Act I, Interlude, Act II, and a conclusion. The demo features a mostly finished Introduction and a shortened version of Act I.

mac_requirements.minimum:

  • Processor: 1,3GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 GB Video Memory

name: Vault Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 7 5800H
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 3050 ti
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: idk
  • VR Support: nope
  • Additional Notes: I haven't had a chance to properly get these. The specs given are my specs. The game runs at max FPS easily. If you have a low-end computer, lmk how your experience is!

short_description: Uncover the story of a mysterious island through the lens of a primitive drone as you search for the artifact concealed within it, and avoid the guardian of the island.
